original: 《 內政 》　強制徵兵會花費金錢，並降低據點的民心、提升民怨。　義理較高的武將，見百姓受苦，其忠誠度也會受影響。
text: "Internal Affairs" 　Compulsory conscription will cost money, reduce public sentiment in strongholds, and increase public grievances.　Military commanders with higher righteousness and loyalty will also be affected when they see the people suffering.
